content:
Increase Messaging Productivity

Congratulations, you created a Messaging channel... now what? After creating a channel, take it to the next level with productivity-boosting features such as messaging components, automated messaging, sensitive data rules, and Einstein Bots.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience. View required editions
 This article applies to:	Messaging for In-App, Messaging for Web, standard and enhanced WhatsApp, standard and enhanced Facebook Messenger, standard and enhanced SMS, enhanced Apple Messages for Business, and Bring Your Own Channel

Here are steps you can take to add valuable functionality to your Messaging channels.

Give agents a library of links, questions with options, and other structured content to send during messaging sessions.	Interactive Messaging Components
Customize the messaging consent requirements, keywords, and auto-responses for a channel.	
Block Sensitive Data in Messaging Sessions and Voice Call Transcripts
Send Automated Messages in Standard Messaging Channels
Send Automated Messages in Enhanced Messaging Channels
Set Push Notifications for Messaging for In-App
Add an Einstein bot to a channel.
Import messaging user data into Salesforce.
Track your service team’s messaging activity.
Report on Messaging Activity in Service Cloud
Customize agent keyboard actions.
Show customers their estimated wait time to be connected to an agent.
Hide the messaging window outside of your business hours.
Update Service Cloud Messaging Channel Settings
Create a library of standard text snippets that agents can insert into messaging sessions.
Configure After Conversation Work Time
Automatically send the customer a survey when a messaging session ends.
Trigger an action, such as an agent flag raise, when an agent or customer enters a keyword in a messaging session.
Show agents and supervisors an AI-generated summary of an ongoing messaging session when they accept or monitor a session.
To give agents more information about the person they’re messaging with, automatically search, link, or screen-pop records during messaging sessions.
Direct customers to your Messaging channels by adding a channel menu on your website.

DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Boosting Service Cloud Messaging Productivity
